questions.question_text: Modules must have a Link type. Which one of the following is a list of Link types?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Order and role unavailable to select.

Selected Answer: B
Order and role unavailable to select.

Selected Answer: C
• List of Records: Displays a list of records from a specified table.
 • Content Page: Displays a custom content page.
 • Order: Refers to displaying an ordered list or a sequential structure.
 • URL (from arguments:): Directs users to a specific URL or webpage.

Selected Answer: B
There is no roles and oreder and catalog in link type.so correct option is B.

Selected Answer: B
B is correct

Selected Answer: B
B is correct, all Link Type options are: ontent Page, Documentation Link, HTML (from Arguments:), List Filter, List of Records, Map Page, New Reocrd, Run a Report, Script (from Arguments:), Search Screen, Seperator, Single Record, Survey, Timeline Page, URL (from Arguments:)

choices.B: Assessment, List of Records, Separator, Timeline Page
choices.D: Assessment, List of Records, Content Page, Roles
choices.A: List of Records, Separator, Catalog Type, Roles
choices.C: List of Records, Content Page, Order, URL (from arguments:)

questions.question_text: When crafting a scoped application that contains flow actions, what is the application called?

choices.A: It needs workflow to manage processes.
choices.C: It uses forms extensively to interact with data.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ABC
I agree that 'It needs workflow to manage processes', 'It requires reporting capabilities', and 'It uses forms extensively to interact with data' are correct.

questions.question_text: Which are reasons an application could be developed on the ServiceNow platform? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ACD
Correct is ACD.

questions.question_text: Once an application is ready to share, which of the following methods of publishing are supported by ServiceNow? (Choose three.)

choices.F: Publish to a local USB device

discussion.content: From the CAD book: Configure the link: repository URL, user name, and password.

A,D&E
Remember that options B (ACL), C (Application name), and F (URL) are not directly related to linking a ServiceNow application to a Git repository. Instead, focus on the URI, user name, and authentication credentials for successful integration.
Password, Username, URL - DEF is correct

Selected Answer: DEF
DEF is the correct answer

Selected Answer: DEF
Repository URL, user name and password

questions.question_text: What is required to link a ServiceNow application to a Git repository? (Choose three.)
